A built-in fabric softener dispenser that releases a small amount of fabric softener with each load.
A built-in stain remover dispenser that releases a small amount of stain remover with each load.
A built-in lint catcher that can be easily removed and washed.
A built-in drainage system that prevents water from overflowing the basket.
A built-in odor eliminator that neutralizes laundry odors.
